description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A living creature within 60 feet would die.

The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times. The triggering creature receives the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Breath of Life]{Breath of Life}, except they recover a number of Hit Points equal to [[/r {6d8+@actor.abilities.con.mod}[healing]]]{6d8 plus your Constitution modifier}.
